TextLibrary.Text: Greetings, Silent One. I bring you a Keck egg.
Greetings, Silent One. I bring you a Keck egg.
I wish to trap creature who destroyed Cygnus II.
I wish to trap creature who destroyed Cygnus II.
But where do I get one?
But where do I get one?
A Mag-Net is an EMP pulse net, used in trapping and securing fast ships. If we can get the parts, I can put one together.
A Mag-Net is an EMP pulse net, used in trapping and securing fast ships. If we can get the parts, I can put one together.
